activity_tracker_crn.name: activity_tracker_crn
activity_tracker_crn.description: Activity tracker crn for COS bucket (Optional)

archive_days.name: archive_days
archive_days.description: Specifies the number of days when the archive rule action takes effect.

archive_type.name: archive_type
archive_type.description: Specifies the storage class or archive type to which you want the object to transition.

bucket_infix.name: bucket_infix
bucket_infix.description: Custom infix for use in cos bucket name (Optional)

cos_instance_name.name: cos_instance_name
cos_instance_name.description: Name of the cos instance where the bucket should be created

cos_key_name.name: cos_key_name
cos_key_name.description: List of strings containing the list of desired Key Protect Key names as the values for each Key Ring, this Key Protect Key is used to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket

cos_key_ring_name.name: cos_key_ring_name
cos_key_ring_name.description: A String containing the desired Key Ring Names as the key of the map for the key protect instance, this Key Protect Key is used to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket

cos_location.name: cos_location
cos_location.description: Location of the cloud object storage instance

cos_plan.name: cos_plan
cos_plan.description: Plan to be used for creating cloud object storage instance

create_cos_instance.name: create_cos_instance
create_cos_instance.description: Set as true to create a new Cloud Object Storage instance

create_key_protect_instance.name: create_key_protect_instance
create_key_protect_instance.description: Set as true to create a new Key Protect instance, this instance will store the Key used to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket

create_key_protect_key.name: create_key_protect_key
create_key_protect_key.description: Set as true to create a new Key Protect Key, this Key Protect Key is used to encrypt the COS Bucket

encryption_enabled.name: encryption_enabled
encryption_enabled.description: Set as true to use Key Protect encryption to encrypt data in COS bucket

environment_name.name: environment_name
environment_name.description: Prefix name for all related resources

expire_days.name: expire_days
expire_days.description: Specifies the number of days when the expire rule action takes effect.

key_protect_instance_name.name: key_protect_instance_name
key_protect_instance_name.description: Name to set as the instance name if creating a Key Protect instance, otherwise name of an existing Key Protect instance to use, this instance will store the Key used to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket

key_protect_key_crn.name: key_protect_key_crn
key_protect_key_crn.description: CRN of the Key Protect Key to use if not creating a Key in this module, this Key Protect Key is used to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket

object_versioning_enabled.name: object_versioning_enabled
object_versioning_enabled.description: Enable object versioning to keep multiple versions of an object in a bucket. Cannot be used with retention rule.

region.name: region
region.description: Name of the Region to deploy in to

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The resource group ID where the environment will be created

retention_default.name: retention_default
retention_default.description: Specifies default duration of time an object that can be kept unmodified for COS bucket

retention_maximum.name: retention_maximum
retention_maximum.description: Specifies maximum duration of time an object that can be kept unmodified for COS bucket

retention_minimum.name: retention_minimum
retention_minimum.description: Specifies minimum duration of time an object must be kept unmodified for COS bucket

retention_permanent.name: retention_permanent
retention_permanent.description: Specifies a permanent retention status either enable or disable for COS bucket

sysdig_crn.name: sysdig_crn
sysdig_crn.description: Sysdig Monitoring crn for COS bucket (Optional)

cos_instance_id.name: cos_instance_id
cos_instance_id.description: The GUID of the Cloud Object Storage Instance where the buckets are created

key_protect_instance_id.name: key_protect_instance_id
key_protect_instance_id.description: The GUID of the Key Protect Instance where the Key to encrypt the COS Bucket is stored

key_protect_key_crn.name: key_protect_key_crn
key_protect_key_crn.description: The CRN of the Key Protect Key used to encrypt the COS Bucket
